```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# Import data from network drive using Python

library(cansim)
library(janitor)
library(xml2)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(flextable)
library(officer)
library(hms)

source("src/trend_report_functions.R")

# Import data
source("src/00_get_data.R")



list_pt <-  if (params$region == "Major provinces") {
  c("Canada",
    "British Columbia",
    "Alberta",
    "Saskatchewan",
    "Manitoba",
    "Ontario",
    "Quebec")
} else {
  c("Canada",
    "British Columbia",

    "Saskatchewan",

    "Quebec",
    "New Brunswick",
    "Prince Edward Island",
    "Nova Scotia",
    "Newfoundland and Labrador",
    "Northwest Territories",
    "Nunavut",
    "Yukon")
}
two_weeks_ago <- params$date - weeks(2)
```
